list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a flat buoyant structure of timber or other materials fastened together, used as a boat or floating platform.
travel on or as if on a raft.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I have rafted along the Rio Grande
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã đi bè dọc theo Rio Grande

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bring or fasten together (a number of boats or other objects) side by side.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we rafted the boats together off the shores of Murchison Island
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đi thuyền cùng nhau ra khỏi bờ đảo Murchison
